data.title: Splurged on a $3.00 cupcake, and was sadly disappointed!
data.text:
We visited the Cupcake Gallery while on a special day out. My daughter and had never been here, but had walked past several times before and admired the beautiful cupcakes in the display case! So on this day, we decided to split one as a special treat.

Upon arrival to the counter, we bought a Red Velvet cupcake with white chocolate frosting. I flinched a little when they rang me up, as the cupcake, which was standard size, not even the "big" gourmet size, cost $3.00 with tax!

But the biggest disappointment came when we ate our cupcake. The cake was dry and crumbly and the frosting was terrible; overly sweet and had an odd "slimy" texture. Even only having half a cupcake each, we could not finish it. It was that bad. We will not be back to this store.
